price: Na wanapo sikia upuuzi hujitenga nao na husema: Sisi tuna vitendo vyetu, na nyinyi mna vitendo vyenu. Salamun Alaikum, Amani juu yenu! Sisi hatutaki kujibizana na wajinga.
arabic: وَإِذَا سَمِعُواْ ٱللَّغۡوَ أَعۡرَضُواْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ لَنَآ أَعۡمَٰلُنَا وَلَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلُكُمۡ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَا نَبۡتَغِي ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
footnotes: Na wanapo sikia upotovu wa wajinga hujitenga mbali nao, kwa kujiepusha na kuondoka, na husema: Sisi tuna a'mali yetu na hatuiachi, na nyinyi mna a'mali yenu ya upotovu na madhambi yake yapo juu yenu. Na sisi tunakuacheni na mambo yenu, kwani sisi hatupendi kusuhubiana na majaahili.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā samiʿū al-laghwa aʿraḍū ʿanhu waqālū lanā aʿmālunā walakum aʿmālukum salāmun ʿalaykum lā nabtaghī al-jāhilīna
